name: DanganDv demo
description:
so basically this is a danganronpa fangame with some of the identity v survivors.

this was a dumb project made by me and all credits are at the beginning

please dont sue me im a child

its only a demo, and the prologue isnt finished but im very impatient

also theres no music because i couldn't figure out how to do that

oh, and if you wanna spoil yourself heres the folder with everything made so far

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1ronTn8joZw6EMweGJYDRmr4x863FcpOB

have fun!
